dialogue.speaker: Margiela
dialogue.text: Yeah! We found this fair and square!

dialogue.speaker: Stray Cats
dialogue.text: This looks like a nice spot, would be a shame if something were to happen to it, don't you guys think?

dialogue.speaker: Cashmere
dialogue.text: I'm sure we can all come to some agreement and find some common gr-

dialogue.speaker: Stray Cats
dialogue.text: I don’t think I appreciate the tone there, buddy. See, the way I see it, this place could easily be our new home.

dialogue.speaker: Calpico
dialogue.text: Guys, let’s talk it out, there’s nothing wrong with sharing, no?

dialogue.speaker: Darius
dialogue.text: What do you think we should do ${name}?

choices.text: Step back in the shadows, watching silently.
Panic and freeze, unsure what to do.
Analyze the situation and find an escape route.
Puff up and challenge them outright.
Try to de-escalate and talk your way out.

dialogue.speaker: ${name}
dialogue.text: We don’t mean any trouble, we’ve been staying here for a while and we have no intent on stepping on your toes, we all want the same thing, to survive.

dialogue.speaker: Cashmere
dialogue.text: Yeah, that’s right - we mean no harm, we just want to see tomorrow.

dialogue.speaker: ${name}
dialogue.text: Your stares mean nothing, come find out what we’re made of!

dialogue.speaker: Marigela
dialogue.text: That’s what I like to hear! We can take them on, easily.

dialogue.speaker: Calpico
dialogue.text: I saw a gap near of the buildings where we can lose them.

dialogue.speaker: Calpico
dialogue.text: Smart, I don’t think these guys are worth the trouble, but I don’t think they plan on leaving us alone.

dialogue.speaker: Darius
dialogue.text: Are you okay, ${name}? Just follow my lead; I got you, hehe.
